title: What’s the Most Common Zodiac Sign?

steps.title: Scorpio (October 23 – November 21)
steps.content: Scorpio (October 23 – November 21) Scorpios are thought to be the most common zodiac signs, which is great—this energetic but cryptic sign is sure to keep things interesting. Never one to get bored easily, Scorpios will always have a trick up their sleeve or be planning their next adventure. Estimated US population: 9.6% [1] X Research source Element: Water [2] X Research source Ruling planet: Pluto and Mars Symbol: Scorpion

steps.title: Virgo (August 23 – September 22)
steps.content: Virgo (August 23 – September 22) Trailing behind Scorpio, Virgos are also fairly common, and they’re also extremely kind. Thought to be one of the most intelligent of the zodiacs, they’re always around to help a friend in need or give advice to someone who asks for it. Estimated US population: 9.4% [3] X Research source Element: Earth Ruling planet: Mercury Symbol: The Virgin

steps.title: Gemini (May 21 – June 20)
steps.content: Gemini (May 21 – June 20) These funny, sociable signs will always be the lift of the party. Geminis want to be your friend no matter what, and they have no trouble getting along with everyone in a room. They love their freedom and never shy away from being independent. Estimated US population: 9.3% [4] X Research source Element: Air Ruling planet: Mercury Symbol: The Twins

steps.title: Pisces (February 19 – March 20)
steps.content: Pisces (February 19 – March 20) Sweet, sensitive Pisces is very in tune with their own creativity. Often called the daydreamers of the zodiacs, they always have a new innovative idea that they can’t wait to share with everyone around them. They never say no to a friend in need, and they’ll always be there for the ones they care about the most. Estimated US population: 9.1% [5] X Research source Element: Water Ruling planet: Neptune Symbol: Fish

steps.title: Libra (September 23 – October 22)
steps.content: Libra (September 23 – October 22) Libra is a very intellectual sign, and you’ll often catch them having friendly debates with friends and loved ones. They exude an air of elegance and class, and they are drawn to both romantic and beautiful things (and people). Estimated US population: 8.8% [6] X Research source Element: Air Ruling planet: Venus Symbol: Scales

steps.title: Cancer (June 21 – July 22)
steps.content: Cancer (June 21 – July 22) Cancers love their space, but they don’t mind letting others in when they need to. They are nurturing, loving, and all around a great sign to have in your life. Estimated US population: 8.5% [7] X Research source Element: Water Ruling planet: Moon Symbol: Crab

steps.title: Aquarius (January 20 – February 18)
steps.content: Aquarius (January 20 – February 18) Aquarius is estimated to be the rarest sign in the United States. They’re a sign that doesn’t blend in with the crowd—they want to stand out and do their own thing. If you have an Aquarius in your life, you’ll definitely know it! Estimated US population: 6.3% [8] X Research source Element: Air Ruling planet: Uranus Symbol: The Water Bearer

steps.title: Leo (July 23 – August 22)
steps.content: Leo (July 23 – August 22) Leo loves to spend quality time with others. Charming and smart, they’ve never met someone they couldn’t have a conversation with. This fun, extroverted sign might not be the most common, but they’re definitely one of the most well-liked of the zodiac signs. Estimated US population: 7.1% [9] X Research source Element: Fire Ruling planet: Sun Symbol: Lion

steps.title: Sagittarius (November 22 – December 21)
steps.content: Sagittarius (November 22 – December 21) Sagittariuses tend to be lone wolves—they need their space, and they enjoy spending time on their own. They’re always open to trying new things, and you’ll probably find them planning their next solo adventure around the world. Estimated US population: 7.3% Element: Fire Ruling planet: Jupiter Symbol: Archer

steps.title: Aries (March 21 – April 19)
steps.content: Aries (March 21 – April 19) Aries are very direct, and they aren’t shy about telling you exactly what they want. They are headstrong and confident, and often find themselves in leadership positions. This is definitely a sign that you want on your side. Estimated US population: 8.1% Element: Fire Ruling planet: Mars Symbol: Ram

steps.title: Capricorn (December 22 – January 19)
steps.content: Capricorn (December 22 – January 19) Capricorns are extremely goal-oriented, and they often push themselves to achieve more than anyone else around them. They are hard workers and great supporters, especially to their friends and family members. Estimated US population: 8.2% Element: Earth Ruling planet: Saturn Symbol: Sea Goat

steps.title: Taurus (April 20 – May 20)
steps.content: Taurus (April 20 – May 20) Taurus are very thick-skinned, and super confident as well. They care a lot about money and are drawn toward the finer things in life. They are extremely loyal and kind-hearted, so they’re a great friend to have by your side. Estimated US population: 8.3% Element: Earth Ruling planet: Venus Symbol: Bull
